name: 田方治
objective:
本課程之主要目的除介紹基本之類神經理論外，更在於運用現有之類神經網路於工業工程領域內之相關運用，將以現有之資料庫實地解決分類、分群、預測、監控等實際問題，使學生能夠了解類神經網路之基礎理論外，更可深入運用此工具。
The objective of this class is to explore the basic theoretical basis and applications of Neural Networks and their applications.  In this course, students will learn how to program and use the neural networks in the specific areas including image processing, pattern recognition, optimization, and others.  The topics of networks covered include: K-means, Radial basis function neural networks, Competitive Nets, SOFM, ART, Hopfield NN, etc.  For practically using ANN, some Digital Image Processing (DIP), Arduino will be added into the course content.
